long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HelthPal可谓是办公人员的良师益友。它有三大亮点功能:
首先,清新时尚的浏览器主题,不但色调柔和减轻视觉疲劳,主题图标还寓意健康快乐,每次打开都是一派好心情!
其次,软件可自定义定时提醒用户休息、饮水、活动筋骨。再忙,也要爱护身体。收到提醒后,站起身做做简单运动,工作效率定然提高!
最后,可添加不同颜色便签条。将待办事项记录下来,可以清晰掌握工作进程,明确工作重点。颜色还可助您分门别类,一目了然。

HelthPal can be an excellent assistant for office workers. It has three outstanding features:

Firstly, the refreshing and stylish browser theme not only soothes eyesight with soft tones to reduce visual fatigue, the theme icons also imply health and happiness, setting up a cheerful mood whenever opening it!

Secondly, the software enables users to customize timed reminders for breaks, drinking water and doing exercises. No matter how busy you are, you still need to take care of your body. Getting up and doing some simple stretches after reminders will surely improve work efficiency!

Lastly, you can add colorful sticky notes. Writing down to-do items allows you to clearly grasp work progress and priorities. The colors also help you categorize tasks for better organization.
